title: Update docs to reflect Panache annotation processor removed for Hibernate ORM/Hibernate Reactive/MongoDB

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

The `docs/src/main/asciidoc/mongodb-panache.adoc` file instructs users to provide use the `quarkus-panache-common` annotation processor, which is no longer required as of 3.9. 

See [Panache annotation processor removed for Hibernate ORM/Hibernate Reactive/MongoDB](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-3.9#panache-annotation-processor-removed-for-hibernate-ormhibernate-reactivemongodb-gear-white_check_mark).


### Implementation ideas

Remove related content.
